case.state: Hello, ~player~! My Secret Shop is still undergoing maintenance. Right now, I only have one product for sale! More will be added later once my developer works on me some more. Oh, and your gold balance is ~marker.gold~.
What's up what's up! I'm Anna, strip poker extraordinaire! I play for that sweet cash prize at then end. Ha, my name's on that check already.
NO REFUNDS! ....... Uhhh, can I help you?

~Player~? Wait a second... Yep, you're on the list! Here's your Member Card, ~player~. You can start earning points for my Secret Shop and get all sorts of goodies! By the way, my creator would enjoy it if you submitted a bug report to let him know!

Well Member ~player~, looks like you have enough gold to buy my first item! It's a pink heart with a 1 on it. Here you go! I'll have more collectibles to sell you later once my creator works on me some more. Anyway, let's play!
I see you got your membership card with you, ~player~! Right now, I only carry one item, a pink heart with a 1 on it! In the future, I'll have all kinds of collectibles available to members only!
There... is a cash prize at the end, right? Right? Please, someone confirm...
There... is a cash prize at the end, right? Right? Please, someone confirm...
I'll take ~cards.text~. And make ~cards.ifplural(them|it)~ good!
Another ace, please!
Make 'em good, dealer!
One royal flush, please...
I lucked out today, only getting paired with boys.
No other girls at the table... That only keeps things interesting for me!
There's only boys here today. Guess I lucked out!
I'm not into girls anyway, so this match will be exciting!
I'm all in!
Cha-ching!
Jackpot!
Triple sevens baby!
Talk about a good exchange rate!
Business is booming!
Is that the o--- Thanks a bunch!
Yahtzee!
Okay, I'm buying a lottery ticket after this!
Whoever came up with the idea of breakable weapons was a genius. It's a brilliant way to get customers back to your store!
If only my sales were this nice!
Ha, and I didn't even have to bribe the dealer!
Ahhh... There's no better feeling than a handful of coins!
A rising tide lifts all boats!
Ah, the thrill of adventure!
Now this is what I call a return on investment!
I'd buy cards like these all day long.
Two words: Cha. Ching.
So, Cynthia... You're a champion? What kind of money does that bring in?
Now that I'm naked, I wonder if the bartender would give something on the house...
I bet if I could catch the bartender tampering with drinks, I could make a quick buck through a lawsuit... Hmmmmm...
I'll keep an eye out for the bartender, I suppose. If he does anything suspicious with the drinks, I could make a pretty penny out of a lawsuit.
This street is chaos. I bet half of these numskulls are pickpockets!
I can sell anything on these streets. But if I so much as feel a hand in my pocket, I'll be selling some pain.
I can sell anything on these streets. But if I so much as feel a hand in my pocket, I'll be selling one-way tickets to prison.
I hope these onlookers remember the golden-rule of being a peeking tom. "Take nothing but pictures and leave nothing but fat stacks of cash behind for the show girl".
Couldn't we have found a more high-end street to play on? These onlookers look... poor...
I think I felt another hand in my pocket... Can I roll a perception check?
Hey, onlookers! I better be paid a royalty for any pictures of me I find being traded!
I should charge all these peeking toms a fee for this...
I bet my inventory of shoulder bags would sell like gangbusters here! Everyone on the street needs a good shoulder bag.
People like stylish footwear here, I trust? I always carry an impressive line of shoes and sandals... Now might be the perfect time to debut my new model of boots!
So did we charge these onlookers admission fees? Don't tell me they're free loaders...
These strip poker games should cost an admission fee to spectate. Could you imagine how much money we'd make if we charged spectator fees?

Being in the middle of a crowd is screaming at me to hold an auction. I GOT A NEW PAIR OF BOOTS NEW PAIR OF BOOTS BOOTS BOOTS CAN I GET FIVE CAN I GET FIVEFIVE, YOU IN THE BACK FOR FIVEFIVEFIVE, CAN I GET TEN CAN I GET TEN---
So, if I buy the street, does that mean I can charge the onlookers for standing on my property? Can someone tell me how quick it takes to buy a street? Matter of seconds, yeah?
Wait, if I incite a mob and I get "injured", can I sue, or would I be liable for inciting the mob in the first place? I mean this is how everyone else makes money, right?
Since we're at the tiki bar, anyone want to buy me a drink? I'll let you talk about your achievements and pretend to listen.
Since we're at the tiki bar, does anyone want to buy me a drink? People usually think I'm using them for free drinks-- and don't get me wrong, I do-- but I swear I'm trying to be social this time!

Guys, I just thought on a million bullion idea! Get ready for... STRIP POKER WHILE SWIMMING! The ocean's right there! ......... On second though, you wouldn't be able to see people strip with only their head above the water...
They sell pia coladas here for only three silver pieces? Talk about a steal!
They sell pia coladas here for six silver pieces? Who they hell do they think they're fooling?
You know, if you were a pervert, finding a job at this tiki bar wouldn't be such a bad gig. I mean, you'd get to watch all the beach babes strip for free!
You know, if you were a pervert, finding a job at this tiki bar wouldn't be such a bad gig. I mean, you'd get to watch all the beach babes strip for free! Hmmm... that gives me some business ideas...

You know, if you were a pervert, finding a job at this tiki bar wouldn't be such a bad gig. I mean, you'd get to watch all the beach babes strip for free! Hmmm... Actually, I could probably set up something similar...
I wonder what kinds of drinks they sell here off the menu...
I wonder what kinds of drinks they sell here off the menu... Hey! I'm talking about that! You guys better not be getting the wrong idea.
I wonder what sorts of drinks you can order here at the tiki bar... Maybe something off menu? Some fancy imported alcohol?
I bet the bartender here is a perv. Ugh, I don't even know what he puts in the drinks.
I bet the bartender is a boy... And boys tend to give girls free shit if we flash them a boob...
I wonder how many schemes I can come up with to make a quick buck on the beach...
The sand here is free, right? Don't people who live far from the coast pay premium prices for this stuff? Hmmmm... Now how can I transport all this sand...
Just so you guys know, if you were planning on walking the beach looking for seashells, I already called dibs. Girls love spending money on seashells! Next time you see me, I'll be rich!
Just so you guys know, if you were planning on walking the beach looking for seashells, I already called dibs. Girls love spending money on seashells! Next time you see me, I'll be rich!
So do pearls really come from oysters? And can't you find oysters in the water? Ugh, there's no since in looking for any though. I'm sure everyone's thought of that already...
Don't kids like to play with beach balls or something on the beach? I could probably buy a few and rent them out here...
Now that I'm topless... You think I could walk around and ask some boys for free shit? I mean there's nothing more irresistible than a topless merchant in this adorable pair of panties.
I got it guys! The perfect money-making scheme! Let's open up a nude beach! We'll attract so many tourists guy.
I totally understand being limited on places to hold this game, but did we really have to hang up all my merchandise around? There's too much risk of theft.
As much as I'm not exactly fond of playing with all my merchandise around, I guess this is the perfect promotional opportunity. You know, to give you guys a bit of a sample of what I offer!
You're kind of cute, ~player~. Heck, I might be willing to go on a date with you even if you're poor.
Feel free to flirt with me, ~player~. Flirting is free!
What do you say, ~player~? Would you want to leave your sole proprietorship and enter a partnership with me?
What do you say, ~player~? Would you want to leave your sole proprietorship and enter a partnership with me? That way you're not one hundred percent responsible for liabilities.
What do you say, ~player~? Would you want to leave your sole proprietorship and enter a partnership with me?
What do you say, ~player~? Would you want to leave your sole proprietorship and enter a partnership with me? That way you're not one hundred percent responsible for liabilities.
Hey, ~student~. You don't file your taxes, do you? Mind if I claim you as a dependent? I could totally boost my tax refund.
Remember guys, the goal is to get all five cards to add up to twenty-one! No going over, highest score wins.
Clarification here, but counting cards is allowed, right?
In addition to being a talented strip poker player, I'm also a shopkeeper! I stock all sorts of rare and unusual items.
If anyone wants to shop around after the match, let's do it! I carry so many unusual things. I'll even offer a discount to second place!

Anyone wanna buy some insurance? I have risen apocalypse insurance, sacred stone-crushing insurance, and even insurance for when you get fired out of the legendary gun Breidablik and summoned to Askr!

Anyone wanna buy some weapons? I'm running a buy one get one half off sale on these lances made of seashells! They fly straight when you throw them and are particularly effective in taking out tacticians.
Anyone got loose change? My shop is selling orbs! Big, blue, shiny orbs! They're used to summon famous heroes to your aid! Breidablik sold separately, lessons not included.
Anyone know the exchange rate in these parts? I have 21,000 NHR I'm looking to transfer into another account...
Remember to invest in AnnaCoin! It's an otherworldly cryptic currency I started. Get this: it's backed by nothing!
Anyone catch how much the market dropped today? I might have to unload some of my investments...
I think this hand is good? Maybe? I can't make heads or tails of it.
I love money! I once bought a horse with five legs, a pair of socks made from pegasus fur, and harp with silent strings! And, of course, I bought some dumb things as well.
Most people miss out on opportunity because it's dressed in fine garments and looks like work.
I love my siblings, especially my sister, Anna! Anna is great too, but so is Anna. Don't get me started with Anna though. Once Anna and Anna start going at it... yeesh.
Most of my siblings are merchants from quaint kingdoms. But one of my sisters, Anna, runs a shop in Shibuya, Japan! She tells me all kinds of crazy stories from her world.
One of my sisters wrote a book titled The Anna Manifesto. It's a joke book. I carry a few copies in stock, if anyone wants a few laughs.
This hand is like the industry standard, except that it's not mass-produced and distributed to retailers to sold for large profits; it's just a poker hand.
So, random question ~player~... What's your mother's maiden name? Oh, and which alley did you live on when you were five years old? Name of your first pet?
Think I could sell used treasure maps? I mean, it's the customer's fault for not inquiring if the treasure is still there...

I should get into the shipping business! I'll just mail out illustrated catalogs of what I carry so customers can mail in purchases! It's all about the easiest way to drain 'em dry... I mean, to bring the shop experience to their doorstep!
Alright guys, what's the craziest thing you've done to pinch your pennies?
So, what's the best deal you've found while shopping? Would you believe it if I told you I once bought three pairs of boots for the price of a porkchop?
How many siblings do you guys have? I think I have... three... maybe four? Maybe five thousand sisters. All named Anna!
I've been thinking about starting my own shipping company... I'd call it Annazon. What do you think?
Just so you guys know, everything I'm wearing is for sale. If you want to buy it, let me know!
Money, gold, bullion... there's all kinds of words for wealth. What words do they have for money where you guys come from?
Okay, so if the kings randomly sent you a stimulus voucher worth like a thousand gold, what would you guys spend it on?
You guys ever do anything insane for cash? Any crazy dares or bets or something?
So, what's the best deal you've found while shopping? Would you believe it if I told you I once bought three pairs of boots for the price of a porkchop?
I feel cheated.
This feels like a scam.
Come on, dealer? You trying to scam me?
Unlucky...
So, how about it, ~player~? Let's trade hands? Mine are so good, I swear!
Hey, uh, anyone wanna trade hands? Embrace the thrill of the gamble!
I don't suppose I can talk anyone into trading hands, huh? Who knows, I may have something good!
No whammy no whammy no whammy no whammy...
Yikes. This is a catch twenty-two...
Ah! I fold...
Looks like my warranty expired...
You wouldn't happen to know anyone that sells bad strip poker hand insurance, do you, ~player~?
Ugh, I'd rather be paying my taxes...
Looks like the market is dropping today...
The Hoshidan Wine Company went down ten points in the stock market today. What a bummer.
This doesn't look too good. But, as they say, with zero-interest financing and an extremely lax repayment plan, anything is possible.
This is what it's like being in the working class.
Uh oh... Bankrupt.
~blank~
I mean, it's not my fault the hurricane happened! It's not my fault the king's an asshole! I just know how to profit off of it. Call it "making the best out of a bad situation".
Thanks for doing business, Tharja! We can wait until after the match to take that photo of you. For now, let's try to enjoy the rest of this match!
Alright, I felt a hand in a pocket. Which one of you finger-grubbers was it. Hm?
With all these people around, I could make a fortune selling my stock! This is premium advertising!
Is that hat a magical hat, Megumin? I don't sell many clothing pieces with stat bonuses... Could you hook me up with your supplier?
What's with the collar, Meggy?
So just how powerful is your magic, Megumin? And how much money can you make with it?
You know, Meggy, these are uncertain times... Should the economy go south, would you mind if I tagged along back to your, uh... Crimson Village?
Hey, Bernadetta... You're a student, right? What kind of grades do you get?
You know Shamir? Tharja? I bet the three of us would make an amazing bunch of schemers. How about we all team up and make cool bar bets we never lose?
No, wait. Actually, I have a better idea. What if the three of us all went looking for treasure!? We'd make a fortune if we found some lost artifacts; like maybe a Fire Emblem or two.
Okay, I got it; it's the perfect trick to get rich! Let's invest in the stock market!
Okay, I know my last couple ideas weren't a hit, but this one will be! There's nothing that could go wrong!
Alright, alright, yeesh. So the unlimited supply of gold idea isn't an... ethical as I thought. But I got a scheme that you two will love for sure.
Okay, one last scheme, guys! This one is sure to be a hit!
You're right, Shamir... Sorry, I was just trying to broaden our horizons.
So, the elixir idea is a no-go, huh? Fine, but what about this: I'll get ahold of some rare treasure maps, and you use your magic to help me find them? Imagine the money we could make!
Tharja, you mean you just want like a love potion or something? I carry those, you know...
Now that's the creepy gloomy stalker girl my sister told me about! Now, let's talk numbers...
Fine, fine, Tharja... You've made your point. I'll take the continent of Valentia. But... keep the inhabitants alive, will you?
Since we're playing strip poker and all, I think now's the perfect chance to try out my camera tome. See, it captures still images from the real world!
I'm glad we could come to an agreement, Tharja! The continent of Valentia and a few lewd pictures for a piece of paper with a few words written on it... (I've outdone myself this time!)
You speak like the prize money is already mine, Sayaka. Glad we're on the same page.
I considered two things, Sayaka. I'll either spend it on craft investements-- that's the smart thing to do--, or I'll act on impulse and spend it on summoning orbs...
Ha, I'm a merchant alright, Megumin. The scummiest!... Except those are just rumors! There's nothing "scummy" about raising prices before a 20% off sale.
Of course, Megumin! Like sales and discounts and tax exemptions and refunds and Black Friday and dividends and clearance shopping and tax refunds...
I'm more interested in selling than buying, Megumin. But if their prices are low, I can upcharge and distribute them across the outrealms! There's loads to be made.
But fear not, Edelgard! I'd make an excellent professor! Now my rates are-
Wait... but, we can't talk about politics here... We can't have the fans shying away from us because they found out which economic policies we support...
Alright, Edelgard. First up, legalize everything. Alcohol, drugs, porn, prostitution, you name it. Everything.
Oh, you must be thinking of my sister, Anna. She's a merchant selling her wares to the people of Fdlan. Tell me, Shamir, is she doing well?
Anyway, aside from entering strip poker tournaments, I also work as a shopkeep in my spare time. Feel free to browse my merchandise after the game; I sell super rare stuff!
No apologies necessary, Shamir!
Byleth has the Failnaught of Fdlan. I have the Failnaught of The Inventory. It's a completely different Failnaught.
Well, if you'd l like to buy Byleth a replacement, let me know, Shamir!
There's so many questions to consider about my new museum! Where should I open it? How do I finance the property? What will my upkeep look like? What should I charge?
At any rate, I think it's best to shelf this museum idea until later. Because I'm kinda losing my chance at this cash prize here...
Hey Tharja, could you help me with something?
Actually, that's my sister, Edelgard! She's one of the best merchants in the family. She takes way more risks than I do. Actually, how's she doing, Edelgard? I haven't heard back from her.
Guess I made a loss on that transaction...
Oh, what a bummer. Looks like I lost.
I don't think this game is panning out very well for me.
Looks like I'm a bit clumsy! Oh well.
Could I get a bye or something? Come on here!
Could I purchase a bye or something? I gotta stay in this!
Aww, I'm not dressed up enough for another loss...
Another loss? Darn it.
These losses are gonna' put me out of business!
Another loss? I'm already out of small stuff too...
At least I didn't pay an entry fee for this...

Should not play. Please send a bug report (Self Must Strip Winning, 1-6). You may be eligible for a cash reward! (Just kidding, you won't be. I'd go broke.) But seriously, send the bug report so I can fix this. Thank you, come again.

Should not play. Please send a bug report (Self Must Strip Normal, 1-6). You may be eligible for a cash reward! (Just kidding, you won't be. I'd go broke.) But seriously, send the bug report so I can fix this. Thank you, come again.
Could I get a bye or something? Come on here!
I don't think this game is panning out very well for me.
This time investment isn't paying dividends...
Glad you asked, Shamir! We could do sleight of hand tricks, for instance: hide a ball under three cups, shuffle them around, but sneakily remove the ball before someone guesses...
The Fire Emblem is no myth, Tharja! My sister, Anna, said one popped up around Archenea. Think of all the fun and profits we could make!
Tharja, use your magic to see into the future and tell me which businesses are going to soar. Shamir, I'll need your help crunching the numbers: how do we diversify our investments?
How about Tharja uses some of that classic alchemy stuff and turns copper into gold? We'd all be rich!

This is honest, Shamir! It's smart gambling. So, let me explain: so you walk into a gambling establishment and make a wager for one gold coin. If you win, awesome! You can start again with another one gold coin wager. But let's say you lose, right? You then make a two gold coin wager. And get this: if you win, you've now earned four gold coins while only spending three. So you've earned yourself a profit of one gold coin, and you start again. And if you lose, no biggie, just double your wager to four. If you lose, you've lost seven gold coins, so you make a wager for eight. And if you lose that, you're down fifteen gold coins. But you just make a wager that is double what your last wager was and you're guaranteed to win! Just make larger and larger bets until you finally win! That win will earn back everything you've previously lost, and there's no risk! It's totally legal, Shamir!
This may come as a surprise to you, but I have ties to the, *cough*black market*cough*. So, what if we---
I could do without the sarcasm, Tharja.
Come on, Tharja! I need your help. We could be rich beyond belief!
I have plenty of treasure maps already, Tharja, but I lack the crew of mercenaries to protect me on my search. That's where you come in, see, and...

That's not what my sisters say. They've covered every corner of this world and other worlds and met some of the greatest mages of all. One of my sisters sold me the recipe. I could sell it to you, Tharja...
Actually, I was thinking something less... finite, Tharja. You deal with alchemy, right? Transmutation? How about, whenever I ask, I bring in some copper and you turn them into gold?
Ha, sorry Tharja. My mistake.
I think my shop needs a little extra something to bring in customers, Tharja... And what's more attention-grabbing of naked photos of a dark mage?!
I'm 100 percent sure, Tharja! Give or take a few zeroes...
It's only my first loss here; that prize money is still mine, and so close! It's so close, I can almost taste it...

Maybe with the prize money, I'll finally catch up on holiday and birthday shopping for my millions of sisters... Having so many sisters sounds like fun, but birthday presents bankrupt the family every time!

You hear stories about people hitting the jackpot and they spend the money on like The Humane Society for Over-riden Horses. What a waste; some people have cute underwear-buying addictions that need to be funded!
Living in this era is so difficult! There's so many frivolous things to buy. And don't even get me started on all the cute lacy underwear they make these days...
Ha, that's not even the start of it!
A shorter lecture, huh? ... Yeah, I mean... sure. But you know, it's mannerly to pay people for advice like this.

The fans, Edelgard. You know, like the person playing this game? Ohhh, right. You're not some half-assed shoe-in mascot thrown around randomly for the sole purpose of selling shit to the fans. You don't break the fourth wall like we Annas do...
"Busy"? Shamir, all Annas are busy. That's how we are! You know what they say. Time is money.
Only the rarest! Invisible underwear, boots made out of moonstone, energy drops, skill books, arms scrolls, master seals, elixirs, abyssian seals... Oh, and legendary weapons!
The Nidhogg is one of the more pricey weapons I carry anyway. The Parthia is far less expensive.
Honestly, the Failnaught of The Inventory is in far better condition. It's never been shot before? Meanwhile, Byleth would rather spin Fdlan's Failnaught around in the air and hit people with it...
Hey... that's a brilliant idea, Shamir!

See Shamir, in a good economy, I could probably make a gross profit of a few thousand bullion per week with lower pricing. Or if I went with a more aggressive pricing strategy, I could potentially double my profits. The quantity of customers served would obviously be lower, and I think my reputation might suffer. There's also security concerns to think about. If I advertised having all of these legendary weapons lying around, thieves would come swarming! And speaking of advertising, how would I market such a scheme? Would people really believe I had all these legendary weapons lying around? Ugh, there's so many questions! And I don't even know what kind of financing plan I'll pursue! I'll have to get ahold of Anna, Anna, Anna, Anna, Anna, Anna, Anna, and maybe even Anna and see what they think! I'm sure one of my sisters would be able to help me out here... But then what if they want a cut of my profits? That could cut deep...
Don't be silly, Shamir. I've played this game a thousand times. There's always a cash prize!
I'll take off my cloak. It doesn't have any special abilities or anything; only the newer models have those.
NO REFUNDS!!! --- Huh? Oh, sorry. Got a little startled there.
My tights next... Looks like I'm in a tight spot.
I may be in a tight spot, but I can still win.
Before you ask, no, I didn't buy this necklace... And I didn't steal it either! I'm an honest cheapskate.
Before you ask, no, I didn't buy this necklace. I found it and haven't gotten around to selling it yet.
All right, the gloves are coming off!
You wanna know something funny? I sell a few pairs of boots that grant the wearer extra movement. Yet, I only wear the basic ones.
You know, I even sell boots that grant the wearer extra movement. Maybe I should start wearing those and compete in races or something. Think there's money to be made in that?
These boots have been through all sorts of adventures. Cross-country traveling, tomb excavations...
These boots have seen it all. Heck, I think these are the pair I brought with me on that grave robbery mission... Wait, did I say "grave robbery"? Ha, I meant "tomb excavation". Yeah, that's it.
This cash prize is slipping from my grasp...
Isn't this dress the cutest? And look, it doubles as a skirt, too. Talk about efficiency!
Drats. I like this pair; hope they don't get dirty.
After paying so much for these, I hope they don't get dirty...
Of course I do, Tharja! You'd be central to any scheme! It's so much easier to make a ball vanish if we have a mage to actually make it vanish.
Yeesh, guys. Where's your sense of adventure?
What? The stock market idea is a no-go? I though for sure you two would go along with that one...
Think of all the profit we would make! We'd have an unlimited supply of wealth! It won't break the economy if only we do it, Shamir.
It's guaranteed money and totally legal and ethical!
Come on guys, help me out! I'm just a humble merchant having to play strip poker for a living. Isn't there some idea out there to get rich quick that's a little more attractive than strip poker?
So, to the tavern then, after the game?
Yep! It's for that love potion, Tharja. And hey, I could give ~player~ a few copies too! I'm sure she'd admire those for many lust-filled nights.
Yep! It's for that love potion, Tharja. And hey, I could give ~player~ a few copies too! I'm sure he'd admire those for many lust-filled nights.

Legendary bow Nidhogg? Yep. The original Sacred Twin of Frelia, and a couple of replicas. That one is... a bit pricey, however. Maybe if you win this game today, I'll give you a discount. Twenty percent off, perhaps?

Legendary bow Nidhogg? Yep. The original Sacred Twin of Frelia, and a couple of replicas. That one is... a bit pricey, however. Maybe if you win this game tonight, I'll give you a discount. Twenty percent off, perhaps?
Well, if there's not... Then I don't think it would matter anyway, since I've... basically lost already...
Get this, Tharja, get this... I'm a shopkeeper with some rare spices and ingredients. What if you turn those ingredients into expensive elixirs and I can sell them? We'll make a killing!
... and then we could use your magical powers to dig it up! And I'll be like "Whoa!" And you'll say "I couldn't have done it without you, Anna!" And we'll make a great team!
Yep! Works like a charm. Now, to negotiate a price...
Oh, come on, Tharja! It won't crash the economy if only I do it!
Right, right... So, just the continent of Valentia will suffice... And... one more thing.
Do you want to do this or not, Tharja?

I can't help but remember that I'm earning interests on all my investments as we speak! Ha, I might have enough to open up shop in a new location, or finally buy that three-winged pegasus I've been looking at!
Ultimately, the smartest thing to do with money is to save it... or spend it all on an adorable pair of undies... Hey, I need a pair to match my new socks!
You know what I wanna buy? A crew of mercenaries. They're pricey, but they'll keep my shop free of looters.
These tights weren't cheap. Can you believe what they charge for tights these days? Ugh, I have to cut back on cute-underwear-buying just to afford a pair.
I'm not big on earrings, but I might buy an expensive necklace one of these days... They say it helps boost sales if a merchant looks her best!

I should stop buying so much cute underwear. After all, I'm three ships short of owning an entire armada, and that's probably more of a priority right now. I mean, what good is cute underwear gonna do me if the kraken strikes today?

I should stop buying so much cute underwear. After all, I'm three ships short of owning an entire armada, and that's probably more of a priority right now. I mean, what good is cute underwear gonna do me if Cthulhu strikes today?
Wait, you don't understand economics, Edelgard? That's not good...

Master of Coin? By the gods of gold, I've dreamed all my life for such an appointment! I could finally make the whole country rich as fuck while still lining my own pockets. You got it, Princess Edelgard!
Anyway, Edelgard, I'd be happy to help you manage your royal treasury. I'll give you a rundown of what you should be doing, but I'll save some of the details until after this match.
I'm not hearing much chatter about the cash prize, other than from Nami. Was there some fine print that I missed?

Oh. No can do, Shamir. Do you know how many sisters I have? It has to be in the hundreds of thousands. Can you imagine if we sent each other birthday cards? That's like a thousand a day! We'd go bankrupt.
Parthia, Yewfelle, Mulagir, Lughnasadh, The Pursuer, Skadi, the Fujin Yumi, Failnaught, the Tathlum Bow... Oh, and The Inexhaustible.
What's the matter, Shamir? You don't approve?
I'll open up a museum with all these fancy-dancy weapons I have lying around. They rack up so much in inventory costs anyway; so why not charge people to see them?
Shamir, you gotta help me out here! Do you know where I could set up the museum? And how much would a bow-enthusiast like yourself pay to see the legendary artifacts?
Well, if there's not... Well, I'm bad hand away from losing anyway...

state.text: This prize money is still mine, I guarantee it! I could probably buy more pairs of over-prices hand-crafted cutesy underwear!
